content: #fhir/infrastructure-wg were just reviewing the formal project plan for UTG which say that it will be complete by this coming WGM. I think we're likely to get a milestone here (if we can sort out the issues around creating code systems) But what's the project plan?

I'm not sure which project plan you reviewed but our task/milestone-oriented project plan is on the Confluence page at https://confluence.hl7.org/display/VOC/UTG+Document+Repository (UTG Project Plan.xlsx). I updated this today on Confluence so it is up-to-date. Our next major milestone is to get all of the required tasks (highlighted in yellow on the project plan) complete prior to the TSC demo of UTG functionality on 1/20. That call will guide how we move forward. I'm happy to review the plan and major timelines with you if that helps.

Hey all. We are transitioning all UTG tasks to Jira tickets in the HSCR project. I wanted to give you a heads up as many of you will be assignees. The assignee is simply who we believe will primarily be involved in the task. Many of these require policy/governance decisions before they can be implemented. No immediate action is required and apologies in advance for all of the notifications that will come out of this transition. @Ted Klein @Joshua Procious @Grahame Grieve @Lloyd McKenzie @Reuben Daniels
